tool_description: (DEMO Only) Go to http://rapid.snowpal.com, and subscribe to the real API there.
name: Snowpal: Project Management
title: Snowpal: Project Management

api_list.name: Get all notifications
api_list.description: Returns all notifications.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://snowpal-project-management1.p.rapidapi.com/notifications"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "snowpal-project-management1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://snowpal-project-management1.p.rapidapi.com/notifications"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "snowpal-project-management1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search user by token
api_list.description: Searches user by token.

api_list.name: Get all events in given window
api_list.description: Returns all events in given window.

api_list.name: Get all events for given day
api_list.description: Returns all events for given day.

api_list.name: Get key pods
api_list.description: Returns key pods. If `batchIndex` is not specified, all pods will be returned in one go.

optional_parameters.name: batchIndex
optional_parameters.description: Specify index of result set (aka, page number).

api_list.name: Get all scales
api_list.description: Returns all scales.

api_list.name: Get block
api_list.description: Returns block for given ID.

api_list.name: Get pod grades for all students
api_list.description: Returns all students' teacher block grades for a given pod.

api_list.name: Get block grades for all students
api_list.description: Returns all students' teacher block grades for a given block.

api_list.name: Get student profile
api_list.description: Returns student profile. This is specific to a Teacher Key.

api_list.name: Get all students in a block
api_list.description: Returns all students in a block.

api_list.name: Get attachment submissions (as student)
api_list.description: Returns attachment submissions (as student)

api_list.name: Get pods using pod type
api_list.description: Returns pods using given pod type.

api_list.name: Get all standalone events
api_list.description: Returns standalone events.

url = "https://snowpal-project-management1.p.rapidapi.com/scheduler/standalone-events"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "snowpal-project-management1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get scale

api_list.name: Get relations matching search token
api_list.description: Returns relations matching search token.

optional_parameters.name: blockId
optional_parameters.description: Specify Block ID (only needed for Block Pods)

optional_parameters.name: keyId
optional_parameters.description: Specify Key ID (only needed for Block Pods)

api_list.name: Get pod relations
api_list.description: Returns relations for given pod ID.

api_list.name: Get block relations
api_list.description: Returns relations for given block ID.

api_list.name: Get all unread notifications
api_list.description: Returns unread notifications.

api_list.name: Get block pod relations
api_list.description: Returns relations for given block pod ID.

api_list.name: Get key relations
api_list.description: Returns relations for given key ID.

api_list.name: Get key pod tasks
api_list.description: Returns key pod tasks.

api_list.name: Get key pod notes
api_list.description: Returns key pod notes. A note is private to the user.

api_list.name: Get key pod
api_list.description: Returns key pod.

api_list.name: Get key pods available to be linked
api_list.description: Returns key pods available to be linked to this key. A pod can only be linked once to a key but it can be linked to any number of keys, and/or blocks.

api_list.name: Get project list
api_list.description: Returns project list for given ID.

api_list.name: Get project lists
api_list.description: Returns project lists.

api_list.name: Get archived pods
api_list.description: Returns archived pods.

optional_parameters.name: batchIndex
optional_parameters.description: Specify index of result set (aka, page number).

api_list.name: Get block checklists
api_list.description: Returns block checklists.

api_list.name: Get block pod comments
api_list.description: Returns block pod comments.

api_list.name: Get block and pods' grades for a student (as teacher)
api_list.description: Returns block and pods' grades for a student. This request should be made by a teacher.

api_list.name: Get student attachment submissions (as teacher)
api_list.description: Returns student attachment submissions (as teacher).

api_list.name: Get student comment submissions (as teacher)
api_list.description: Returns student comment submissions (as teacher).

api_list.name: Get key pod and block scale values
api_list.description: Returns key pod and block scale values using given scale.

api_list.name: Get blocks and pods associated with key
api_list.description: Returns blocks and pods associated with given key.

api_list.name: Get key pod checklists
api_list.description: Returns key pod checklists.

api_list.name: Get filtered user keys, blocks and pods for given key
api_list.description: Returns `created by me`, `shared with me`, and `shared with others` filter results for given key.

api_list.name: Get linked resources
api_list.description: Returns blocks & key pods linked to keys, and key pods linked to blocks.

api_list.name: Get key pod attachments
api_list.description: Returns key pod attachments.

api_list.name: Get block types and blocks based on them (in key)
api_list.description: Returns all block types along with blocks in given key that use those block types.

api_list.name: Get pods based on pod types (in key)
api_list.description: Returns all pod types along with pods in given key that use those pod types.

api_list.name: Get key
api_list.description: Returns key for given ID.

api_list.name: Get key pod collaborators
api_list.description:
Returns key pod collaborators. 

Alternate endpoint - `/pods/:id/collaborators`.

api_list.name: Get block pod checklists
api_list.description: Returns block pod checklists. A block pod can have any number of checklists.

api_list.name: Get block pods
api_list.description: If you want to fetch block pods in batches (_of 16_), set `batchIndex` to _true_. Else, all block pods will be returned in one go.

optional_parameters.name: batchIndex
optional_parameters.description: Specify index of result set (aka, page number).

api_list.name: Get block tasks
api_list.description: Returns block tasks.

api_list.name: Get block notes
api_list.description: Returns block note. A note is private to you and therefore, will not be available to your collaborators even if the block is shared.

api_list.name: Get block comments
api_list.description: Returns block comments. If the block is shared with other collaborators, the comment will be available to them as well.

api_list.name: Get linked block pods
api_list.description: Get block pods linked to given block or key.

api_list.name: Get block grades for all students (for charts)
api_list.description: Returns grades of all students for given block.

api_list.name: Get block attachments
api_list.description: Returns attachments associated with the given block.

api_list.name: Get all blocks available to be linked to this key
api_list.description: A block can be linked to any number of keys but it can only be linked to a key once. Use this endpoint to get a list of all blocks that are available to be linked to a given key.

api_list.name: Get blocks linked to pod
api_list.description: A pod can be linked to one or more blocks. This endpoint returns all blocks a given pod is linked to.

api_list.name: Get blocks in a key
api_list.description: Returns all blocks in a key.

optional_parameters.name: aclWriteOrHigher
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if ACL is write or higher.
- False, otherwise.

optional_parameters.name: batchIndex
optional_parameters.description: Specify index of result set (aka, page number).

api_list.name: Get all archived blocks
api_list.description: Returns a list of all archived blocks in given key.

optional_parameters.name: batchIndex
optional_parameters.description: Specify index of result set (aka, page number).

api_list.name: Get unread count
api_list.description:
Returns unread count for -
  - Notifications 
  - Conversations
  - Blocks Due
  - Pods Due
  - Tasks Due
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://snowpal-project-management1.p.rapidapi.com/dashboard/unread-count"

api_list.name: Get all users this key pod can be shared with
api_list.description: A key pod can be shared with a user only once. So, when you search for a user, this will return all users that match your search query that do not already have access to the key pod.

api_list.name: Get blocks using block type
api_list.description: Returns blocks using given block type.

api_list.name: Get block pod tasks
api_list.description: Returns block pod tasks.

api_list.name: Get all users this block pod can be shared with
api_list.description: A block pod can be shared with a user only once. So, when you search for a user, this will return all users that match your search query that do not already have access to the block pod.

api_list.name: Get block pod collaborators
api_list.description:
Returns block pod collaborators. 

Alternate endpoint - `/blocks/:id/pods/:id/acl`.

api_list.name: Get block collaborators
api_list.description:
Returns a list of all users who have access to a given block. Depending on where the block is located, there will be differences in access levels.

- A block in a Teacher Key can be granted _admin_ or _read_ access. By granting admin access, you make that user a _Teacher_. If you granted _read_ access, the user will become a *Student*.
- A block in a Project Key can be granted _admin_, _write_, or _read_ access. If you want the collaborator to be able to share the block in turn, grant them _admin_ access. Else, you can grant them _write_, or _read_.
